#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
    int t;
    
    cin>>t;
    
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,i,j,flag=0;
        
        cin>>n;
        
        int a[n][n];
        
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            for(j=0;j<n;j++)
            {
                cin>>a[i][j];
            }
        }
        
        int k=n/2;
        
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            for(j=0;j<n;j++)
            {
                if(a[i][j]!=a[n-1-i][n-j-1])
                {
                    flag=1;
                
                }
            }
        }
        
        
        if(flag==0)
        cout<<"Yes"<<"\n";
        else
        cout<<"No"<<"\n";
    }
}
